author: noslav
content: Would it be possible to know about the current estimated date of the next hard fork and its codename? Also where and how can I keep track of them?

author: noslav
content: as in both in the past and the ones in the future

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <poojaranjan19> You may visit https://www.ethereumcatherders.com to follow upgrades in Ethereum. Also, feel free to create an issue [here](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues) if you'd have general query related to Ethereum upgrades.

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <poojaranjan19> Exact date is not announced yet, but next upgrade is expected on mainnet in Jun-July.
